Photo : Getty Images Two years ago, Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie dropped a bombshell : the Hollywood power couple was splitting up after two years of marriage but roughly 12 years together. What followed were months of back and forth between the ( former ) couple in the press. There were leaks about custody battles and Pitt ’ s reported drinking and weed smoking ; meanwhile, Pitt gave a candid interview with GQ about the split and his new passion for sculpture and R & B music. The acrimony between Pitt and Jolie momentarily died down a bit in the press — but this summer, there were a slew of new stories, court filings, and suspicious tabloid take - downs in this never - ending saga.
